text: For Lithium batteries (includes Power Banks), no more than two spare batteries exceeding 100Wh and up to 160Wh, are permitted.

It depends on the destination airport. Generally, you are allowed a maximum of 1 cabin bag, not exceeding 7kg and with the Sum of L + W + H (including the wheels) must be no more than 115cm (45 inches).
Yes, depending on the flight and availability, we can put in a request for an upgrade from Economy.
